subject: Basketball
Babies
lead_paragraph: Houston Rockets star Yao Ming is now a father. The 7-foot-6 Yao and his wife, Ye Li, had a baby girl on Friday at a Houston hospital, the team spokesman Nelson Luis said.
snippet: Houston Rockets star Yao Ming is now a father. The 7-foot-6 Yao and his wife, Ye Li, had a baby girl on Friday at a Houston hospital, the team spokesman Nelson Luis said.
